briefTitle: Staging of Axillary Lymph Nodes Using the PEM Flex Solo II Pet Scanner in Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Staging of Axillary Lymph Nodes Using the PEM Flex Solo II Pet Scanner in Patients With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Sensitivity and Specificity of FDG Positron Emission Mammography (PEM) in Identifying Axillary Lymph Node (ALN) Metastases From Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women 18-75 years old with newly diagnosed breast cancer who are considered candidates for breast conserving surgery (i.e. lumpectomy).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Children (\<18 years old)
* Pregnant or Lactating women
* Diabetic patients (Type I or II)
* Patients who are scheduled for a sentinel node procedure using radioactive Tc-99m within 24 hours of PEM
* Patients who have NOT undergone a standard of care bilateral breast MRI at UC.
